se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model

Class WorldMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model.WorldMap

  • public class WorldMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains Maps with relations for the provinces on the game board and the players controlling them. Has methods for checking and dealing out ownership to territories.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorldMap

        public WorldMap(java.lang.String provinceString,
        java.lang.String continentFile,
        java.util.ArrayList<IPlayer> players)
        Parameters:
        provinceString - the provinces separated with new line and the neighbors of the province, separated by "-" Example: A-B-C\nB-A\nC-A
        continentFile - representing the diffrent continents. The continents are separeted with new line. One continent are built up by int bonus, followed by the provinces in the continent, separeted with "-" Example: 3-A-B-C, a continents that gives the bonus 3 and contains the provinces A,B,C
        players - players

    • Method Detail

      • getOwner

        public IPlayer getOwner(java.lang.String provinceName)
        Returns ownership of a certain territory.
        Parameters:
        provinceName - A province name sent to the method
        Returns:
        The owner of the province sent to the method

      • changeOwner

        public void changeOwner(java.lang.String provinceName,
               IPlayer player)
        Changes the ownership of a certain territory. Also changes the number of provinces that the players involved controls.
        Parameters:
        provinceName - Name of the province that will change owner.
        player - Which player the ownership should change to.

      • isNeighbours

        Checks if two territories are adjacent.
        Parameters:
        provinceName1 -
        provinceName2 -
        Returns:
        True if the territories are next to each other.
